mapper.sql: r.*, v.vehicle_number vehicle_number, fn_type2name('remoteType',r.type) typeName, fn_type2name('remoteStatus',r.status) remote_status, u.account user_account, u.name user_name, t.longitude car_longitude, t.latitude car_latitude, t.speed speed, t.angle angle, t.lock_status_info lock_status_info
mapper.select:
select
from (tbl_remote_control r left join (tbl_vehicle_seal_status c left join tbl_vehicle_track t on c.vehicle_track_id=t.id) on r.vehicle_seal_status_id=c.id),tbl_user u,tbl_vehicle v where c.vehicle_id = v.id and r.user_id = u.id

select
from (tbl_remote_control r left join (tbl_vehicle_seal_status c left join tbl_vehicle_track t on c.vehicle_track_id=t.id) on r.vehicle_seal_status_id=c.id),tbl_user u,tbl_vehicle v where c.vehicle_id = v.id and r.user_id = u.id and r.id=#{id}
